data.title: Great service at Sharkeez!
data.text: Probably 75-80 of us assembled for a high school class reunion  This venue was just the right size, and what stood out so much was the service. I counted three bartenders, all friendly and serving quickly, then also several wait staff who made frequent contact to make sure everyone was taken care of. I thought they did an admirable job of dealing with the whole mob of us! Hats off!

data.title: bar night
data.text: Nice bar, college age group, shows local sports games. lots of room to move around. Good food for a bar and service is above average.

data.title: Best bar in dowtown
data.text: I have been to almost every bar in downtown LS.  This is my favorite by far.  It's not the largest but there always seems to be room.  The staff and patrons are always in a festive mood.  It's cleaner than most and the beer is always really cold.

data.title: Night out
data.text: We stopped by here on a whim. We had been years ago and was curious.  We were waited on immediately.  The drinks were on the strong side and the cost was very reasonable.  They did not serve food  but did allow you to order from a nearby restaurant and have it delivered.  We will definitely go back.

data.title: Nice Bar - Sports Easy to Watch Here
data.text: Nice bar with free popcorn (as of this writing). I am just a beer guy so I am pretty easily satified if there is a decent beer menu. I have never had food here - not even sure if they serve it.
